item.title: ETF 能否延续美国梦？
item.description:
在本期Trillions节目中，尼克-马焦利（Nick Maggiulli）解释了他的 "财富阶梯 "概念，以及如何攀登财富阶梯。【原文：

In this episode of Trillions, Nick Maggiulli explains his “wealth ladder” concept and how you can climb its rungs.

】

item.title: 泰国家庭债务将出现五年来最大幅度增长：民意调查
item.description: 一项调查显示，由于经济疲软和生活成本上升迫使公民求助于非正规贷款机构，泰国的平均家庭债务预计将以五年来最快的速度激增。【原文：Thailand’s average household debt is expected to surge at the fastest pace in five years as a weakening economy and rising cost of living force citizens to turn to informal lenders, a survey showed.】

item.title: SAP 遭欧盟软件支持行为反垄断调查
item.description: SAP SE 已受到欧盟反垄断调查的冲击，调查内容是这家德国软件巨头是否扭曲了与其销售的管理程序相关的维护和支持服务的竞争。【原文：SAP SE has been hit by a European Union antitrust probe into whether the German software giant distorted competition for maintenance and support services related to a management program it sells.】

item.title: 陷入困境的香港建筑商新世界完成 5.08 亿美元贷款
item.description: 据周四提交的一份证券交易所文件显示，新世界发展有限公司以其皇冠上的明珠资产维多利亚港湾为抵押，通过承诺银行贷款筹集了 39.5 亿港元（5.08 亿美元）。【原文：New World Development Co. has raised HK$3.95 billion ($508 million) via a committed bank loan secured by its crown jewel asset, Victoria Dockside, according to a stock exchange filing Thursday.】

item.title: 私营和公共市场将在零售现金争夺战中汇合
item.description: KKR & Co.的欧洲私募股权投资联席主管 Philipp Freise 认为，私募市场的民主化将是未来十年金融业的一个关键主题。【原文：The democratization of private markets will be a key theme for the financial industry in the coming decade, according to KKR & Co.’s Co-Head of European Private Equity Philipp Freise.】

item.title: 政治风险加剧，新兴市场资产下跌
item.description: 由于财政和地缘政治风险抑制了对该资产类别的需求，新兴市场股票和货币下跌。【原文：Emerging-market stocks and currencies fell as fiscal and geopolitical risks damped demand for the asset class.】

item.title: 期权定价表明多头担心错过年底反弹
item.description: 尽管人们对美国股市是否存在泡沫讳莫如深，但一直在对冲经济下滑的投资者现在却开始担心错过年底可能出现的反弹。【原文：For all the hand-wringing over whether the US stock market is in a bubble, investors who have been hedging against a downturn are now getting worried about missing a potential year-end rally.】

item.title: 曼谷大型天坑修复工程预计耗时约两周
item.description: 泰国当局预计将在两周内完成曼谷一条繁忙道路的修复工作，此前一个巨大的天坑吞噬了汽车，并引发了人员疏散，当局还下令在全市范围内检查地铁施工现场是否有沉降迹象。【原文：Thai authorities expect to finish repairs to a busy Bangkok road within two weeks after a massive sinkhole swallowed cars and prompted evacuations, and have ordered citywide inspections of subway construction sites for signs of subsidence.】

item.title: 中国顶级铜冶炼企业呼吁采取行动反对新增产能
item.description: 中国顶尖的铜冶炼企业正敦促政府部门加强对新产能的控制，并警告说残酷的竞争已将加工费推向历史低点，威胁着该行业的健康发展。【原文：China’s top copper smelters are urging the authorities to tighten control over new capacity, warning that cut-throat competition has driven processing fees to historical lows, threatening the industry’s health.】

item.title: 萨科齐因利比亚现金竞选资金问题被判有罪
item.description: 法国前总统尼古拉-萨科齐（Nicolas Sarkozy）在一起案件中被巴黎法官定罪，该案指控萨科齐在 2007 年竞选获胜的过程中暗中得到了已故穆阿迈尔-卡扎菲（Moammar Qaddafi）政权数百万欧元的资助。【原文：Former French President Nicolas Sarkozy was convicted by Paris judges in a case into allegations his 2007 winning campaign was covertly funded by millions of euros from the late Moammar Qaddafi’s regime.】

item.title: 欧洲央行应 "特别关注 "食品价格上涨：博客
item.description: 欧洲中央银行的一篇博文指出，食品成本的快速上涨对当前的货币政策尤为重要，因为这可能会推高通胀预期。【原文：Rapidly rising food costs are especially relevant for monetary policy right now as they could drive inflation expectations higher, according to a European Central Bank blog post.】

item.title: 南非港口状况有所改善，但仍在世界银行排名中垫底
item.description: 根据世界银行集团和 S&P Global 公司的一项排名，南非为改善其主要港口的运营所做的努力已经取得了一定的成效，但这些设施仍然是全球表现最差的港口之一。【原文：South Africa’s efforts to improve operations at its main ports have gained traction, though the facilities still remain among the worst harbors globally in terms of performance, according to a ranking by the World Bank Group and S&P Global.】

item.title: 科技时尚达人被控骗走投资者 3 亿美元
item.description:
美国证券交易委员会（SEC）和司法部称，CaaStle 完成了近代科技史上最大的金融劫案之一。该公司陷入困境的首席执行官说，事情还没完。【原文：

CaaStle pulled off one of the biggest financial heists in recent tech history, according to the SEC and DOJ. The company’s embattled CEO says there’s more to the story.

】

item.title: 墨西哥有望将关键利率降至三年来最低点
item.description: 由于经济活动疲软抑制了通胀压力，预计墨西哥将于周四将利率降至三年来的最低点。【原文：Mexico is forecast to cut interest rates to a three-year low on Thursday as weak economic activity curbs inflationary pressure.】

item.title: 预算问题迫在眉睫，债券投资者对法国网开一面
item.description: 债券投资者正在给陷入困境的法国总理塞巴斯蒂安-勒科尔努（Sebastien Lecornu）一个修复国家财政的机会，但他们的耐心只能到此为止。【原文：Bond investors are giving embattled French Prime Minister Sebastien Lecornu a chance to fix the nation’s finances, but their patience will only go so far.】

item.title: 印度将迎来近三十年来最繁忙的 IPO 月
item.description: 9 月份，印度将有 25 家公司在该国主要交易所上市，成为近三十年来此类交易最繁忙的月份。【原文：India could see 25 companies launch their IPOs in September on the nation’s main exchange board, making it the busiest month for such kind of deals in nearly three decades.】

item.title: 克瓦查升值推动赞比亚通胀率降至 24 个月低点
item.description: 由于货币走强有助于降低进口成本，赞比亚的年通货膨胀率在 9 月份降至两年来的最低水平。【原文：Zambia’s annual inflation decelerated to its lowest level in two-years in September as a stronger currency helped curtail import costs.】

item.title: 莫迪不顾特朗普压力支持与俄罗斯建立 "久经考验 "的关系
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）表示，印度与俄罗斯有着深厚的伙伴关系，回击了美国要求印度减少与莫斯科接触的压力。【原文：Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi said the country has a deep partnership with Russia, pushing back against US pressure to scale down its engagement with Moscow.】

item.title: Ticketmaster 承诺在 "绿洲 "门票调查后做出改变
item.description: Live Nation Entertainment Inc. 旗下的 Ticketmaster 公司同意对其票务业务进行某些调整，因为英国反垄断监督机构担心该公司在去年销售绿洲乐队门票时有误导顾客的风险。【原文：Live Nation Entertainment Inc.’s Ticketmaster agreed to make certain changes to its ticketing business following the UK’s antitrust watchdog concerns that it risked misleading customers in last year’s sale of Oasis tickets.】

item.title: 马来西亚皇室寻求出售价值 27 亿美元的新加坡地块
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，马来西亚亿万富翁国王的长子正在寻求出售新加坡的一块黄金地块，这可能是新加坡有史以来最大的房地产交易之一。【原文：The eldest son of Malaysia’s billionaire king is seeking to sell a prime Singapore plot, people familiar with the matter said, in what may be one of the city-state’s biggest-ever real estate deals.】

item.title: 喜力出售欧元债券为收购 FIFCO 业务提供资金
item.description: 喜力公司（Heineken NV）将出售三部分欧元债券，为其 32 亿美元收购佛罗里达冰雪农场公司（Florida Ice and Farm Company）的饮料和零售业务提供资金支持。【原文：Heineken NV is selling a three part euro-denominated bond to help finance its $3.2 billion acquisition of Florida Ice and Farm Company’s beverage and retail businesses.】

item.title: 英国杂货商 Co-op 因网络攻击遭受 1.2 亿英镑利润损失
item.description: 英国连锁超市 Co-op 表示，本财年的营业利润将因 4 月份的一次网络攻击而面临 1.2 亿英镑（1.62 亿美元）的损失，这次攻击迫使该公司暂时关闭了一些关键系统。【原文：British supermarket chain Co-op said it’s facing a £120 million ($162 million) hit to operating profit this fiscal year from a cyberattack in April that forced it to temporarily shut down a number of critical systems.】

item.title: Ozan Tarman 谈黄金和科技股持续上涨的驱动因素
item.description:
德意志银行全球宏观部副总裁听到了什么？【原文：

What Deutsche Bank's vice chair of global macro is hearing.

】

item.title: 奇货可居：奥赞-塔尔曼谈黄金和技术的持续上涨（播客）
item.description: 奇货可居：奥赞-塔尔曼谈黄金和技术的持续上涨（播客）【原文：Odd Lots: Ozan Tarman on Nonstop Rise in Gold and Tech (Podcast)】

item.title: 顾问警告：不改革，德国经济增长将难以为继
item.description: 德国领先的研究机构称，由于财政扩张迅速，德国经济将出现反弹，但除非政府解决根本问题，否则这种推动力将是暂时的。【原文：Germany’s economy is set for a rebound thanks to rapid fiscal expansion, but the boost will prove temporary unless the government addresses underlying issues, according to the country’s leading research institutes.】

item.title: 南非消费者情绪因缺少工作和税收而低落
item.description: 由于个人所得税增加以及养老基金提前支取的影响减弱，中等收入家庭的财务状况面临压力，南非消费者信心在第三季度有所下降。【原文：South African consumer confidence fell in the third quarter as middle-income household finances came under strain amid higher personal income taxes and the fading impact of early pension fund withdrawals.】

item.title: 卡齐米尔称欧洲央行将保持耐心，目前已实现通胀目标
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员彼得-卡齐米尔说，决策者已经实现了通胀目标，没有必要急于改变利率。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Peter Kazimir said policymakers have met their inflation target and have no need to rush into any more changes in interest rates.】

item.title: 泰国总理誓言采取审慎政策避免评级下调
item.description: 在惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）以公共财政风险上升为由下调泰国评级展望一天后，泰国总理阿努廷-差威拉库（Anutin Charnvirakul）表示，泰国将采取一切可能的措施避免主权信用评级被下调。【原文：Thailand will take all possible measures to avert a sovereign credit rating downgrade, Prime Minister Anutin Charnvirakul said, a day after Fitch Ratings lowered the nation’s outlook citing rising risks to public finance.】

item.title: 瑞士央行维持零利率，自 2024 年初以来首次停止宽松政策
item.description: 瑞士国家银行（Swiss National Bank）维持借贷成本不变，停止了宽松周期，官员们回避了恢复负利率的可能性。【原文：The Swiss National Bank kept borrowing costs unchanged, halting its easing cycle as officials shirk from a return to negative interest rates.】

item.title: 人工智能初创企业 Nscale 融资 11 亿美元用于数据中心扩张
item.description: 人工智能数据中心开发商 Nscale 在英国宣布与英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）和 OpenAI 建立合作伙伴关系一周后，已融资 11 亿美元。【原文：Nscale, a developer of artificial intelligence data centers, has raised $1.1 billion in financing a week after announcing its partnership with Nvidia Corp. and OpenAI in the UK.】
